checkAvailable() - Method in class SpaceInvaders.Objects.Bonus
Abstract function that is implemented by the classes that implement Bonus class
checkAvailable() - Method in class SpaceInvaders.Objects.Life
check if its time hasn't passed yet, if it is the availability will turn false
checkAvailable() - Method in class SpaceInvaders.Objects.Protection
if the time has passed sets the availability to false
checkDead() - Method in class SpaceInvaders.Test.EnemyTest
Checking if the enemy dies, and this can be from 2 forms: if it's a normal enemy if he dies when he gets shot or if it's a boss that dies when the health reaches 0.
checkDead() - Method in class SpaceInvaders.Test.SpaceShipTest
Check if the space ship dies and therefore if its possible to die upon an enemy attack two different dieing possibilities due to imediate dead (colisions between rocks & enemys) or the collision between shots fired by the enemies that only take a part of the current life
checkMovement() - Method in class SpaceInvaders.Test.SpaceShipTest
Checks if the current position of the spaceShip changes.
checkMultipleSquaresCollision() - Method in class SpaceInvaders.Test.CollisionTest
 
checkPoints() - Method in class SpaceInvaders.Test.SpaceShipTest
Check if the points of the space ships are correctly increased when it's shots destroy an object
checkProtection() - Method in class SpaceInvaders.Objects.SpaceShip
Checks protection, if the time is above the protection max time, the protection will be disabled
checkShots() - Method in class SpaceInvaders.Test.SpaceShipTest
Checks if the current shot was added to the spaceShip; in the running game there is another option that is due to the frequency of the fire rate, allowing or not the user to fire and therefore not adding the shot to the space ship.
checkSquareCollision() - Method in class SpaceInvaders.Test.CollisionTest
This function draws a rectangle on the limits of the image both images and checks if there was any intersection between them, if there was it returns true or false checking this way if there was a collision between them.
Collision - Class in SpaceInvaders.Engine
Class Collision
Collision(SpaceObject, SpaceObject) - Constructor for class SpaceInvaders.Engine.Collision
In this constructor, the type is set to its default value.
Collision(SpaceObject, SpaceObject, int) - Constructor for class SpaceInvaders.Engine.Collision
In this constructor, the type is set to its default value.
